channel.title: Run.bat [FIXED]
channel.description:
Hey guys, I've been looking around for about an hour now trying to find a solution but couldn't. Every time i try and run my server, I get the error "java is not recognized as an internal or external command. Any help? This is my current code:
[code=java]@echo off title none java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
Thanks

item.title: Run.bat [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:3, topic:520211”][quote author=matzie link=topic=638705.msg4305330#msg4305330 date=1369688325]
You weren’t looking very hard…

Probably about 4000 posts on here from that problem O_o
[/quote]
If you’re not going to help him don’t post.[/quote]

Do you see my point though? After i posted i went though the posts and started looking for examples, and i was going to post at least 20 links to them to be a smart ass. In this case it was solved before i got my list compiled though.

Saying this with honestly is impossible if you have been on this server for years: "I have never seen a post asking about setting environmental variables, ‘[java/javac] is not recognized as an internal or external command’, ‘[compile/run].bat is not working–HELP!!!’ and so on.

Read full topic
